headline.main: Offensive on Continent in a Year Seen by British if Invasion Fails; Psychological Effect on Occupied Lands if Hitler Is Thrown Back Is Stressed -- Air Equality by September Is Expected

lead_paragraph: Many Americans believe that even though Britain successfully withstands a German invasion the subsequent military defeat of Hitlerism on the Continent would be infinitely difficult and long drawn out, if not almost impossible of accomplishment.
abstract: J Cowles on Brit plans for offensive on Continent
snippet: Many Americans believe that even though Britain successfully withstands a German invasion the subsequent military defeat of Hitlerism on the Continent would be infinitely difficult and long drawn out, if not almost impossible of accomplishment....

byline.original: By JOHN COWLESCopyright 1941 by The Minneapolis Star Journal Company
